String: the ServiceState field to receive updates on
getUriForSubscriptionIdAndField(int,java.Description: Generates a content @B_android#net#Uri_E@ used to receive updates on a specific field in the ServiceState provider. Use this @B_android#net#Uri_E@ with a @B_android#database#ContentObserver_E@ to be notified of changes to the @B_android#telephony#ServiceState_E@ while your app is running. You can also use a @B_android#app#job#JobService_E@ to ensure your app is notified of changes to the @B_android#net#Uri_E@ even when it is not running. Note, however, that using a @B_android#app#job#JobService_E@ does not guarantee timely delivery of updates to the @B_android#net#Uri_E@.

getUriForSubscriptionId(int).Description: Generates a content @B_android#net#Uri_E@ used to receive updates on every field in the ServiceState provider. Use this @B_android#net#Uri_E@ with a @B_android#database#ContentObserver_E@ to be notified of changes to the @B_android#telephony#ServiceState_E@ while your app is running. You can also use a @B_android#app#job#JobService_E@ to ensure your app is notified of changes to the @B_android#net#Uri_E@ even when it is not running. Note, however, that using a @B_android#app#job#JobService_E@ does not guarantee timely delivery of updates to the @B_android#net#Uri_E@.
